Do you really want to quit stage?
If you bounce the ball against the wall, it increases the attack.
Balls with sky-blue skills increase attack power and speed as they bounce against the wall.
If you attack a ball with yellow skills, it\'s pushed back a lot, and if you bounce off the wall, it\'s as much damage as your attack power.
Use "Bomb" items. Damage to nearby enemies.
A ball with green skills restores the ball in the same team that attacked.
A ball with red skill is twice as powerful as it does not bounce off the attack.
Tap the screen before a ball with a purple skill stops, it will damage nearby enemies and stop immediately. Itself also gets 10 damage
Welcome to the first boss stage.
Be careful when attacking a ball with multiple skills. Think about what will happen.
Use the recovery item when you need recovery.
Shield items reduce damage by half.
Power items make attacks twice as powerful.
This is the last stage of the first world.
Ball can be recovered by touching a ball that has its own green skill.
Random items can have item effect or skills.
Be careful not to touch the thorns.
With bomb items, you can remove any nearby thorns.
A ball with black skills reduces damage by as much as 10. Damage of 10 or less will not be effective
A ball with a red skill ignores the effect of a thorny bush.
